account_knowledge_base_cleanup_warning: When the free version team does not log in to the system for 30 consecutive days, the system will automatically clean up the account knowledge base.
ai_points_usage_tip:
Each time the AI ​​model is called, a certain amount of AI points will be consumed. 
For specific calculation standards, please refer to the "Billing Standards" above.
package_usage_rules: Package usage rules: The system will give priority to using more advanced packages, and the original unused packages will take effect later.
password_mismatch: Password Inconsistency: Two passwords are inconsistent
password_tip: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least two combinations: numbers, letters, or special characters
please_bind_notification_receiving_path: Please bind the notification receiving method first
reminder_create_bound_notification_accou: Remind the creator to bind the notification account
token_validity_period: Points are valid for one year
usage_balance_notice:
Due to the system upgrade, the original "automatic renewal and deduction from balance" mode has been cancelled, and the balance recharge entrance has been closed. 
Your balance can be used to purchase points
